languages.text: {n}Вы едва замечаете стремительный удар — и умирающий ксенос затихает. Маражай стряхивает чужую кровь с клинка.{/n} "Этот себя исчерпал. Давай же найдем кого-то, еще полного жизни и боли".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы едва замечаете стремительный удар — и умирающий ксенос затихает. Маражай стряхивает чужую кровь с клинка.{/n} "Этот себя исчерпал. Давай же найдем кого-то, еще полного жизни и боли".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы едва замечаете стремительный удар — и умирающий ксенос затихает. Маражай стряхивает чужую кровь с клинка.{/n} "Этот себя исчерпал. Давай же найдем кого-то, еще полного жизни и боли".

traits.locale_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow, and the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai brushes his blood off the blade.{/n} "This one has been exhausted. Let us find somebody else, full of pain and vitality."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow, and the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai brushes his blood off the blade.{/n} "This one has been exhausted. Let us find somebody else, full of pain and vitality."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst den schnellen Stich kaum. Der sterbende Xenos verstummt. Marazhai wischt das Blut von seiner Klinge.{/n} "Er war bereits leergeblutet. Finden wir einen anderen, jemanden voller Schmerz und Vitalität."
languages.original_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst den schnellen Stich kaum. Der sterbende Xenos verstummt. Marazhai wischt das Blut von seiner Klinge.{/n} "Er war bereits leergeblutet. Finden wir einen anderen, jemanden voller Schmerz und Vitalität."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}你甚至都没看清这记迅捷的攻击，垂死的异形就永远地住了嘴。玛拉斋擦去了刀刃上的血迹。{/n}“这个家伙已经被榨干了。我们得再去找一个，找一个充满痛苦和活力的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."

traits.locale_text: {n}你甚至都没看清这记迅捷的攻击，垂死的异形就永远地住了嘴。玛拉斋擦去了刀刃上的血迹。{/n}“这个家伙已经被榨干了。我们得再去找一个，找一个充满痛苦和活力的人。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une lame scintille. Le xénos retombe, raide mort. Marazhai essuie sa lame maculée de sang.{/n} « Celui-ci était inutile. Trouvons-en un autre, encore palpitant de vie et de douleur. »
languages.original_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une lame scintille. Le xénos retombe, raide mort. Marazhai essuie sa lame maculée de sang.{/n} « Celui-ci était inutile. Trouvons-en un autre, encore palpitant de vie et de douleur. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Apenas notas el rápido golpe. El xenos moribundo se calla. Marazhai limpia la sangre de su espada.{/n} «Este ya estaba drenado. Busquemos a otro, a alguien lleno de dolor y vitalidad».
languages.original_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."

traits.locale_text: {n}Apenas notas el rápido golpe. El xenos moribundo se calla. Marazhai limpia la sangre de su espada.{/n} «Este ya estaba drenado. Busquemos a otro, a alguien lleno de dolor y vitalidad».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}その素早い一撃はほとんど目に止まらなかった―死にかけだった異種族が沈黙する。マラズハイが剣の血を拭った。{/n}「こいつはすでに限界だった。別の奴を探そう、苦痛と活力に溢れた奴をな」
languages.original_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."

traits.locale_text: {n}その素早い一撃はほとんど目に止まらなかった―死にかけだった異種族が沈黙する。マラズハイが剣の血を拭った。{/n}「こいつはすでに限界だった。別の奴を探そう、苦痛と活力に溢れた奴をな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Hızla gelen darbeyi son anda fark ediyorsun. Ölen zeno, sessizliğe gömülüyor. Marazhai, kılıcındaki kanı siliyor.{/n} "İşi çoktan bitmişti. Acı çeken, diri hisseden başka birini bulalım."
languages.original_text: {n}You barely notice the swift blow — the dying xenos falls silent. Marazhai wipes the blood off his blade.{/n} "This one was already drained. Let us find another, someone full of pain and vitality."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hızla gelen darbeyi güçlükle görebiliyorsun ve ölen zeno sessizliğe gömülüyor. Marazhai kılıcındaki kanı siliyor.{/n} "Bunun işi çoktan bitmişti. Acı ve yaşam enerjisi dolu başka birini bulalım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
